# Project Data
This shiny apps will calculate your age and display your zodiac sign based on birthday input.

#Presentation
The slide show presentation of this app can be viewed at http://rpubs.com/nazilacj/developingdataproducts. This was created using R Presentation.

# Code Reproducibility
The code for the shiny apps can be downloaded from the github repo at https://github.com/nazilacj/Developing_Data_Products.

This repo contains all the code and data making up this solution. The files and folders are the following:

1. README.md - 
2. app.R - The shiny app code 
3. /presentation - The R Markdown used to create the RStudio Presenter presentation.
